acceptance-test-run.title: (/products-and-docs/widgets/) Verification for all the page's links
acceptance-test-run.name: (/products-and-docs/widgets/) Verification for all the page's links

test-group.name: [1] {elementKey=Checkout Widget Button, pageURL={url}/products-and-docs/widgets/checkout/, pageTitle=//h1}
Given open Widgets page
When check visibility and click {Checkout Widget Button} element of Widgets page

test-step.description: Validate and click element: Checkout Widget Button

test-group.name: Then check that new page opened from Widgets page has {{url}/products-and-docs/widgets/checkout/} and {//h1}

test-step.description: Check if page is opened: {url}/products-and-docs/widgets/checkout/, //h1, http://127.0.0.1:4000
